## SortableProps type

Extracts sortable properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SortableProps<T> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P] extends Comparable ? T[P] : never;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Comparable](./paramodel.comparable.md)
